languages.text: Барка про огромное колесо от лифта.

traits.locale_text: Барка про огромное колесо от лифта.

languages.text: Колесо напоминает те, что поднимают вверх огромный лифт на центральной площади. Только это насквозь проржавело от времени.
The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.
languages.original_text: Колесо напоминает те, что поднимают вверх огромный лифт на центральной площади. Только это насквозь проржавело от времени.

traits.locale_text: The wheel is similar to the ones that raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, is so old, it is thoroughly rusted.
The wheel is similar to the ones that raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, is so old, it is thoroughly rusted.
The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.
The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.
The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.
The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

languages.text: この歯車は、中央広場の巨大なエレベーターを動かすのに使われているものと似ている。だが、歳月のせいで完全に錆びついてしまっている。
languages.original_text: The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

traits.locale_text: この歯車は、中央広場の巨大なエレベーターを動かすのに使われているものと似ている。だが、歳月のせいで完全に錆びついてしまっている。

languages.text: Çark, merkez meydandaki dev asansörü kaldırmak için kullanılanlara benziyor. Yıllar içinde her yanı paslanmış.
languages.original_text: The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

traits.locale_text: Çark, merkez meydandaki dev asansörü kaldırmak için kullanılanlara benziyor. Fakat yıllar geçtikçe her yanı paslanmış.

languages.text: La rueda es similar a las que elevan el enorme ascensor de la plaza central, pero esta ha quedado oxidada por el paso de los años.
languages.original_text: The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

traits.locale_text: La rueda es similar a las que elevan el enorme ascensor de la plaza central, pero esta ha quedado oxidada por el paso de los años.

languages.text: 这个轮子类似于中央广场上那些用来驱动巨型电梯的轮子，但已经完全锈蚀了。
languages.original_text: The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

traits.locale_text: 这个轮子类似于中央广场上那些用来驱动巨型电梯的轮子，但已经完全锈蚀了。

languages.text: La roue ressemble à celles qui actionnent l'immense ascenseur, sur la place centrale, à cette différence près que celle-ci est couverte de rouille.
languages.original_text: The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

traits.locale_text: La roue ressemble à celles qui actionnent l'immense ascenseur, sur la place centrale, à cette différence près que celle-ci est couverte de rouille.

languages.text: Das Rad ähnelt den Rädern, die den riesigen Aufzug auf dem zentralen Platz bedienen. Dieses hier ist allerdings total verrostet.
languages.original_text: The wheel is similar to the ones used to raise the enormous elevator in the central square. This one, however, has completely rusted through with age.

traits.locale_text: Das Rad ähnelt den Rädern, die den riesigen Aufzug auf dem zentralen Platz bedienen. Dieses hier ist allerdings total verrostet.
